args:
Pinon grows frustrated at Nevin's apparent
loafing about the Halidom, but in truth the older
apostle has pursued his own investigation.
The team then returns to the fray in order to
uncover the location of their foe's base.
And the van to myself! HAAAAH!
Amazing... Their teamwork is so fluid!
The product of a deep trust among them.\nYet apostles fight in a far different manner;\nyou'll learn little of use watching them.
A fiend's broken through to Pinon!
Holy crap, Pinon! What was THAT?!
A Sigil. We apostles are linked to the\narchangels through their power.
Something akin to our dragon pacts, then?\nA connection you share?
Similar, perhaps, but ultimately different.\nIt is like a nail that binds us together.
Fine, I'll ask Nevin. He seems happy to...\nHey, wait. Where IS Nevin?
No doubt lollygagging about the Halidom's\ncourtyard while I take on the lion's share\nof the duties!
Hey, no one is lollygagging here—I just\ndelegated the task to the most fitting\nperson, which would be you.
And what is YOUR duty, then?
Papa Bear is an ideas man! I analyze data\nfrom your reports and use it to track our\nperpetrators' whereabouts.
You expect to learn such without ever\nsetting foot outside the castle walls?
Someone's in a snit today. You wake\nup on the wrong side of the altar?

The people of the Halidom are on the front
lines risking life and limb while you
remain safe and cozy inside its walls.
Does that explain her dissatisfaction?
I merely find it galling that you would ask\nanother's help without lifting a finger\nyourself. It is a troubling attitude.
Good work isn't measured by attitude—\nit's measured by results. Leastwise,\nthat's always been MY policy.
Then by all means, grace us with these\n＂results＂ of yours. And if you impress me,\nI MIGHT see my way to forgiving you.
Easy on the snark there, rookie.\nBut sure, take a look.
This is a map of South Grastaea.
Indeed. Now, you all just came back from\nnorth of Rovetelle. Right abooout...here.
So the next site will be north of Myriage\nLake oveeer...there. The northwest delta.
Next site? Wait, are you saying that's\nwhere the next wroth fiends will appear?
Another pack of those mad fiends have\nbeen sighted, so we're heading out.
Northwest of Myriage Lake. There's a\nsylvan village there, so we need to move.
How did you know this, Nevin?!
Because I'm the brains of the team.\nSeriously, we've been over this.
That is not what I... Ugh! We shall\nreturn to this conversation later!
I shall in time. But first, I would like\na status report.
That prediction of yours was no mean\nconjecture—am I correct in assuming\nyou have pinpointed their stronghold?
Pretty much, but it still isn't a sure thing.\nOne or two more data points ought to\nsort it out, though.

I look forward to you reaching a swift
conclusion—as I am certain Pinon does
as well. It wouldn't do to go disappointing
your juniors now, hmm?
Heh. Her expectations of me aren't\nexactly sky-high, but I suppose I'll do\nwhat I can to see her satisfied.
